name: deep_research_tool
description: Conducts deep research on a given DATEV guideline, policy, or software-rule topic and returns a structured report.

functions.name: run_research
functions.description: Takes a topic string and returns the path to a Markdown file containing the research report.

arguments.topic: The guideline, policy, or software-rule topic to research (string)

returns.description: Filesystem path to the saved Markdown report, or an error message beginning with [ERROR].
